TopicTitle: Can anyone recommend me a melody similar to that (It's from Dragon Ball GT)

Articles.Content:
Can anyone recommend me a melody similar to that (It's from Dragon Ball GT) i don't knew why but i love that song.?

I do not like manga and anime, are strange and sometimes ridiculous, but I love Dragon Ball, in particular Dragon Ball GT for a beautiful soundtrack

especially this one one:D

I know it's weird, I do not like Anime, but I love Dragon Ball
